TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit JulianCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 表示儒略历。

span.span: Represents the Julian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 45年公元前凯撒大帝排序日历修订，这将导致调用罗马儒略历的日历中。In 45 B.C., Julius Caesar ordered a calendar reform, which resulted in the calendar called the Julian calendar. 罗马儒略历是前置任务的公历。The Julian calendar is the predecessor of the Gregorian calendar. > [!NOTE] > 有关使用信息类和其他日历.NET Framework 中的类，请参阅[使用日历](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 类只识别当前纪元。The class recognizes only the current era. 与公历，不同罗马儒略历作为年份整除由 4 个无例外的定义为闰年。Unlike the Gregorian calendar, the Julian calendar defines a leap year as a year that is evenly divisible by four with no exceptions. 因此，一天每隔 128 年日历是不准确。Therefore, the calendar is inaccurate by one day every 128 years. 平 365 年天并且初始屏幕闰年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 公历，如罗马儒略历具有 28 到 31 天的 12 个月： 年 1 月 （31 天）、 年 2 月 (28 或 29 天为单位)、 年 3 月 （31 天）、 年 4 月 （30 天）、 月 （31 天）、 年 6 月 （30 天）、 年 7 月 （31 天）、 年 8 月 （31 天）、 年 9 月 （30 天）、 年 10 月 （31 天）年 11 月 （30 天） 和年 12 月 （31 天）。Like the Gregorian calendar, the Julian calendar has 12 months with 28 to 31 days each: January (31 days), February (28 or 29 days), March (31 days), April (30 days), May (31 days), June (30 days), July (31 days), August (31 days), September (30 days), October (31 days), November (30 days), and December (31 days). 2 月有 29 天在闰年和 28 在平年。February has 29 days during leap years and 28 during common years. 日期到公元 2001 年 1 月 1 日The date January 1, 2001 A.D. 在公历日历相当于在公元 2000 年 12 月 19 日in the Gregorian calendar is equivalent to the 19th day of December in the year 2000 A.D. 在儒略历。in the Julian calendar. 目前，不使用任何支持的区域性类。Currently, the is not used by any of the cultures supported by the class. 因此，类可以仅用于计算中罗马儒略历的日期。Therefore, the class can be used only to calculate dates in the Julian calendar. 每个对象支持一组的日历。Each object supports a set of calendars. 属性返回区域性的默认日历和属性返回一个包含所有支持的区域性的日历数组。The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要更改使用的日历，应用程序应设置属性到新。To change the calendar used by a , the application should set the property of to a new .

returns.span: 将指定月数添加到指定的 中时得到的 。

span.span: The that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 日部分的生成如果结果的日期不是有效的一天中生成月份影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它将更改为在生成每年的生成的每月最后一个有效的一天。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 所生成的年份部分如果外部的指定年，则结果月份受到。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此实现支持仅当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果所得年份未指定纪元，将引发。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 所生成的一天时间部分保持与指定相同。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，如果指定的月份是年 10 月，其中包含 31 天，指定的日期是该月第 31 天和的值`months`参数为 6，则结果年份是一个多个指定的年份，生成的月份是年 4 月，并生成 day 为 30 天，这是年 4 月的最后一天。For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day in April. 如果值`months`参数是负数，生成早于指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 属性返回值始终等于。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留属性`time`通过调用的参数方法，如以下示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示几个组成部分的值方面罗马儒略历。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Julian calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet/CPP/juliancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet/CS/juliancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet/VB/juliancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每年的日期被指从该年度的第一天的天数。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，对的第一个月的第一天返回 1，和最后一天的上个月返回总天数这一年。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year. 总是相同的值返回的。The total is the same value as that returned by . ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示几个组成部分的值方面罗马儒略历。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Julian calendar. .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetLeapMonth(int32 year, int32 era) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetLeapMonth (year As Integer, era As Integer) As Integer
public: override int GetLeapMonth(int year, int era);

param.name: year
param.span: 一个整数，用于表示年份。

span.span: An integer that represents the year.

param.name: era
param.span: 一个整数，用于表示纪元。

span.span: An integer that represents the era.

summary.span: 计算指定纪元年份的闰月。

span.span: Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.

returns.span: 一个正整数，用于表示指定纪元年份中的闰月。

span.span: A positive integer that indicates the leap month in the specified year and era.

returns.span: 另外，如果日历不支持闰月，或者 和 未指定闰年，此方法将返回零。

span.span: Alternatively, this method returns zero if the calendar does not support a leap month, or if and do not specify a leap year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在日历中支持闰月的概念，在某个特定的月份之后或在每一年中的任何月份之后发生的闰月。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如，方法返回一个数字，介于 1 和 13，该值指示指定的日期与关联的月份。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果一年中，在第八个和第 9 个月之间存在闰月方法闰第八个月的 9 和 10 第 9 个月的第八个月份返回 8。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

span.span: if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与公历，不同罗马儒略历作为年份整除由 4 个无例外的定义为闰年。Unlike the Gregorian calendar, the Julian calendar defines a leap year as a year that is evenly divisible by four with no exceptions. 因此，一天每隔 128 年日历是不准确。Therefore, the calendar is inaccurate by one day every 128 years. 例如，1999 年不是闰年，但 2000 年。For example, the year 1999 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was. 平 365 年天并且初始屏幕闰年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 闰日是仅在闰年中发生了一天。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. 在儒略历的年 2 月 29 日是唯一的闰日。In the Julian calendar, the 29th day of February is the only leap day. ## Examples 下面的示例调用五年中每个纪元的第二个月份 （年 2 月） 的最后一天。The following example calls for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/juliancalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/juliancalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/juliancalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与公历，不同罗马儒略历作为年份整除由 4 个无例外的定义为闰年。Unlike the Gregorian calendar, the Julian calendar defines a leap year as a year that is evenly divisible by four with no exceptions. 因此，一天每隔 128 年日历是不准确。Therefore, the calendar is inaccurate by one day every 128 years. 例如，1999 年不是闰年，但 2000 年。For example, the year 1999 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was. 平 365 年天并且初始屏幕闰年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 闰月是仅在闰年中发生的整月。A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year. 罗马儒略历没有闰月。The Julian calendar does not have any leap months. ## Examples 下面的示例调用当前纪元中的五年中的所有每月。The following example calls for all the months in five years in the current era. MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);

param.name: year
param.span: 一个两位数或四位数的整数，用于表示要转换的年份。

span.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: 使用 属性将指定的年份转换为四位数年份，以确定相应的纪元。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: 包含 的四位数表示形式的整数。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。 is the last year in the 100-year range that can be represented by a two-digit year. 通过查找指定的唯一匹配项来确定世纪`year`该 100 年范围内。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the specified `year` within that 100-year range. 例如，如果设置为 2029，则 100 年范围是从 1930年为 2029年。For example, if is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 1930，而 29 一个 2 位数字值被解释为 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 将两位数年份值 (小于 100) 传递会导致方法的值转换为一个四位数字值根据值，该值表示相应的纪元。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果应用程序提供在支持的日历范围到内的四位数年份值，该方法返回实际的输入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果应用程序提供一个四位数字值超出了支持的日历，或者它提供了负值，则该方法将引发异常。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 超出了日历支持的范围。

span.span: is outside the range supported by the calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int TwoDigitYearMax { get; set; }
.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许两位数年份，要正确转换为 4 位数年份。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，如果此属性设置为 2029年，100 年范围是从 1930年为 2029年。For example, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 1930，而 29 一个 2 位数字值被解释为 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 类不会检测系统设置中的更改。The class does not detect changes in the system settings. 应用程序可以将此值设置为 99，以指示按字面解释 2 位数字的年份。The application can set this value to 99 to indicate that 2-digit years are to be taken literally. 例如，如果此属性设置为 99，100 年范围为 0 （不是有效值对于大多数日历而言） 和 99 之间。For example, if this property is set to 99, the 100-year range is from 0 (not a valid value for most calendars) to 99. 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 30。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 30.

exception.span: 为设置操作指定的值小于 99。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is less than 99.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-
